Deletes appointments that match the customer ID being deleted.
deleteCustomerAppts(int) - Method in class DAO.AppointmentDAOImpl
Deletes a customer's appointments if/when the customer gets deleted from the system due to foreign key dependencies.

displayClock method uses the EventHandler interface with a lambda expression to display a formatted animated digital clock on the Customers Menu.
